title: Nyerere The African and Democracy Q3

content.question: As outlined in the second paragraph, Nyerere’s view of the contrast between African post-independence politics and the “Anglo-Saxon form of democracy” most directly explains why some African independence leaders

choices.label: eventually embraced authoritarian forms of government, including Soviet-style socialism
opposed their countries joining the United Nations
failed to prevent the fracturing of their countries along ethnic and religious lines
embraced the concept of “Africa for the Africans” and sought to restrict the rights of European settlers

content.answer: eventually embraced authoritarian forms of government, including Soviet-style socialism

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
